TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed StringFormatFlags extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定文字字串的顯示和配置資訊。

span.span: Specifies the display and layout information for text strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正由類別。 is used by the class. > [!NOTE] > FitBlackBox 欄位已命名的錯誤，且其行為類似於`NoFitBlackBox`欄位中的原始 GDI + 實作。The FitBlackBox field was misnamed and its behavior is similar to the `NoFitBlackBox` field in the original GDI+ implementation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範下列成員：The following code example demonstrates the following members: - - - - - - - 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`ShowLineAndAlignment`方法時處理表單的事件，將傳遞`e`為。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowLineAndAlignment` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Misc2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc2/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Misc2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc2/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Misc2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc2/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags DirectionRightToLeft = int32(1)

span.span: Text is displayed from right to left.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags DirectionVertical = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags DisplayFormatControl = int32(32)

summary.span: 控制字元 (例如由右至左標記) 會以代表圖像 (Glyph) 顯示於輸出中。

span.span: Control characters such as the left-to-right mark are shown in the output with a representative glyph.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags FitBlackBox = int32(4)

summary.span: 允許部分字元突出字串的配置矩形。

span.span: Parts of characters are allowed to overhang the string's layout rectangle.

summary.span: 根據預設，會重新調整字元位置以避免任何突出部分。

span.span: By default, characters are repositioned to avoid any overhang.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags LineLimit = int32(8192)

summary.span: 只有整行會配置在格式化矩形中。

span.span: Only entire lines are laid out in the formatting rectangle.

summary.span: 根據預設值，配置會持續到文字結束為止，或者持續到因為裁剪 (Clipping) 而讓文字不再顯示為止 (無論何者先發生)。

span.span: By default layout continues until the end of the text, or until no more lines are visible as a result of clipping, whichever comes first.

summary.span: 請注意，預設值會格式化不是行高整數倍數的矩形，藉此部分遮蔽最後一個文字行。

span.span: Note that the default settings allow the last line to be partially obscured by a formatting rectangle that is not a whole multiple of the line height.

summary.span: 若要確保只看見完整的文字行，請指定這個值，並小心提供至少與單行同高的格式化矩形。

span.span: To ensure that only whole lines are seen, specify this value and be careful to provide a formatting rectangle at least as tall as the height of one line.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags MeasureTrailingSpaces = int32(2048)

summary.span: 包含每行結尾處的後端空白字元。

span.span: Includes the trailing space at the end of each line.

summary.span: 根據預設值，由 方法傳回的邊界矩形會排除每行末端的空白。

span.span: By default the boundary rectangle returned by the method excludes the space at the end of each line.

summary.span: 設定這個旗標，會將該空白包含在測量範圍內。

span.span: Set this flag to include that space in measurement.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags NoClip = int32(16384)

summary.span: 允許顯示圖像的突出部分和超出格式化矩形外部的未換行文字。

span.span: Overhanging parts of glyphs, and unwrapped text reaching outside the formatting rectangle are allowed to show.

summary.span: 根據預設值，超出格式化矩形外部的所有文字和圖像會加以裁剪。

span.span: By default all text and glyph parts reaching outside the formatting rectangle are clipped.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags NoFontFallback = int32(1024)

summary.span: 停用將要求字型中不支援的字元字型回溯為替代字型的功能。

span.span: Fallback to alternate fonts for characters not supported in the requested font is disabled.

summary.span: 任何遺漏的字元會以字型遺漏圖像加以顯示，通常是空心正方形。

span.span: Any missing characters are displayed with the fonts missing glyph, usually an open square.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags NoWrap = int32(4096)

summary.span: 停用在矩形中進行格式化時的行間文字換行功能。

span.span: Text wrapping between lines when formatting within a rectangle is disabled.

summary.span: 當傳遞點而非傳遞矩形時，或者當指定矩形具有為零的線長度時，即暗示這個旗標。

span.span: This flag is implied when a point is passed instead of a rectangle, or when the specified rectangle has a zero line length.
